name: Kawaii Frog BBQ
description:
Thanks for playing or at least looking at this game.
Tell me what you think of this game. I hope you enjoy it.

This is a remix of Ebeth's very sweet marshmallow roasting game June 28th (June 28th is in 2 days but I am too impatient and no one would care if I submitted this to itch.io two days early).

Thanks again.
